caption: Table 1: Quantitative comparisons of SceneCraft against baselines.
description: This table presents a quantitative comparison of the proposed SceneCraft model against three baseline methods: Text2Room, MVDiffusion, and Set-the-scene.  The comparison uses both 2D metrics (CLIP Score and Inception Score) and 3D quality metrics (3D Consistency and Visual Quality), which are assessed via a user study. Higher scores indicate better performance.  The results demonstrate that SceneCraft outperforms the baselines across all metrics.
